__e: Why did you refuse to see me this afternoon?
True... but he rejected my sincere request.
I should not have been surprised if you refused to see me.
He wouldn't talk, so they threw the book at him.
She refused to talk to anybody but you.
He refused to talk to her.
She said that you refused to eat your lunch and that you made love to a woman.
But she wouldn't work a lick unless the old boy was right on the track with her.
Remember when she was sick and refused to stop working? Well, this is a whole different business...
A little while ago, you turned me down.
If his soul refuses, what then?
She told me that a few days ago, she'd refused a room to a couple with a baby. -I refusedaroomtoacouple withababy.
- Have you turned down any employment...?
When did you ever turn down a job?
I'll bet you've never refused a present.
